sense.def:
A screw
je majhen priostren kos kovine z navojem; z njim eno stvar pritrdimo na drugo.

To screw something to something else
pomeni nekaj pritrditi na nekaj drugega z enim ali več vijaki.

seg.quote: I'm going to screw some handles onto the bathroom cabinet.
The curtains are attached to special clips which screw to the window-frame.

sense.def:
To screw something
pomeni tudi nekaj pritrditi s krožnimi gibi.

seg.quote: He screwed the lid tightly onto the top of the jar.

sense.def:
To screw up one's face
pomeni nabrati obraz v nenaravno obliko.
To screw up something flexible
pomeni stisniti ali zviti nekaj prožnega tako, da izgubi prvotno obliko.

seg.quote: She screwed up her eyes as she faced the sun.
She screwed up the paper and tossed it in the bin.

sense.def:
To screw up a plan or situation
pomeni povzročiti, da načrt ne uspe ali da se nekaj slabo konča;
